body:
Just to note, this isn't an argument, its a discussion.

I think 2v1s, 3v1s, anyV1s are acceptable. I see loads of people complaining like 'omg legoche scrub 2v1 me nub' or 'stupid scrubby teamers' or something. One thing to make straight.


ITS A TEAM GAME!



What are your opinions on this? Discuss, Discuss, Discuss.
body_tagged:

What are your opinions on this? Discuss, Discuss, Discuss.
title: My Opinions On 2v1s, 3v1s, ETC.

replies.body: Honestly, I don't know why people make such a big deal out of this. If you get teamed, why does it matter? Maybe you were the only player in a certain area of the map where there just so happened to be multiple enemy players. Some people make way too big a deal out of this, and it's just pointless.
replies.body_tagged: Honestly, I don't know why people make such a big deal out of this. If you get teamed, why does it matter? Maybe you were the only player in a certain area of the map where there just so happened to be multiple enemy players. Some people make way too big a deal out of this, and it's just pointless.

replies.body:
Look at it this way, they need more than 1 player to kill you, take it as a compliment
.

replies.body: I don't really care about being 2 or 3 v1'ed normally. It's when someone is running away from me and they see their teammate coming and the runner turns around and 2v1's me. Really. You were just running away.

replies.body: Learn to kill teams. End of story.
